comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Opera/9.80 (Windows NT 6.1; U; en) Presto/2.8.131 Version/11.10
Build Identifier: Thunderbird 3.1.10

Please add an account option to control if a email attachment is automatically downloaded to the operating system.
This option should help prevent virus/worm infections and increase the overall performance when downloading messages.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
For Windows xp, vista, 7
1. Launch Thunderbird 3.1.10 and log into your account.
2. Receive an email with an attachment infected with the netsky worm.
3. Click on the header to view the message.

Actual Results:  
Thunderbird should behave normally.

Expected Results:  
Your anti-virus software should alert an infection when you view the message.
comments.author: blarry@bateru.com
